name: distribution-not-selected
description: Choose a distribution by setting an env 'npm set ows_dist <app-template>' and running 'npm run apply'.
changes: changes to this file can be commited with the --no-verify option

scripts.postinstall: npm run apply && echo && echo "Repo configured for ${npm_config_ows_dist} distribution." && echo
scripts.start: echo && echo "Choose a distribution by setting an env 'npm set ows_dist <app-template>' and running 'npm run apply'." && echo
scripts.apply: npm i fs-extra@0.30 && cd app-template && node apply.js ${npm_config_ows_dist} && cd .. && npm i
